aspect: 1. Young accountant Jacob Phillips, 23, fell to his death from a 70ft cliff after running to avoid paying a fare.
2. Phillips ran from his cab in the dark, not realizing the danger he was in.
3. An inquest found the death an accident, with Phillips becoming disoriented and unaware of the sheer drop-off just yards beyond the fence.
